content:
When an IG is published what canonical will resolves?

I assume the usual suspects:

  • CapState
  • ImpGuide
  • ValueSet
  • CodeSystem

...

What about other resources like:

  • Measures
  • MessageDef
  • GraphDef
  • Questionnaires

Is the IG publication considered then the "registry" or should the authors submit them to some official registry as a separate step ?
In theory, it should be anything with a canonical...
but not examples right? and does this become a "de facto" registry ?
If the examples are of things that have canonicals, probably...
